## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`ufw`](#ufw): Installs and enables Ubuntu's "uncomplicated" firewall.
* [`ufw::config`](#ufwconfig): Installs and enables Ubuntu's "uncomplicated" firewall.
* [`ufw::install`](#ufwinstall): Install support class
* [`ufw::service`](#ufwservice): Supporting class to set up the ufw service

### Defined types

* [`ufw::allow`](#ufwallow): Create allow rule
* [`ufw::deny`](#ufwdeny): Define deny rule
* [`ufw::limit`](#ufwlimit): Set rate limit for port
* [`ufw::reject`](#ufwreject): Define reject rule

## Classes

### <a name="ufw"></a>`ufw`

Installs and enables Ubuntu's "uncomplicated" firewall.

* **Note** Be careful calling this class alone, it will by default enable ufw
and disable all incoming traffic.

#### Examples

##### when declaring the ufw class

```puppet
include ufw
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `ufw` class:

* [`allow`](#allow)
* [`deny`](#deny)
* [`deny_outgoing`](#deny_outgoing)
* [`forward`](#forward)
* [`limit`](#limit)
* [`log_level`](#log_level)
* [`manage_service`](#manage_service)
* [`reject`](#reject)
* [`service_name`](#service_name)

##### <a name="allow"></a>`allow`

Data type: `Hash`

Set of connections to allow.

Default value: ``undef``

##### <a name="deny"></a>`deny`

Data type: `Hash`

Set of connections to deny.

Default value: ``undef``

##### <a name="deny_outgoing"></a>`deny_outgoing`

Data type: `Boolean`

Block out going connections.

Default value: ``false``

##### <a name="forward"></a>`forward`

Data type: `Enum['ACCEPT','DROP','REJECT']`

Behavior for forwards.

Default value: `'DROP'`

##### <a name="limit"></a>`limit`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of connections to limit.

Default value: ``undef``

##### <a name="log_level"></a>`log_level`

Data type: `Enum['off','low','medium','high','full']`

Level to log with.

Default value: `'low'`

##### <a name="manage_service"></a>`manage_service`

Data type: `Boolean`

Manage the service.

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="reject"></a>`reject`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of connections to reject.

Default value: ``undef``

##### <a name="service_name"></a>`service_name`

Data type: `String`

Name of service to manage.

Default value: `'ufw'`

### <a name="ufwconfig"></a>`ufw::config`

Installs and enables Ubuntu's "uncomplicated" firewall.

### <a name="ufwinstall"></a>`ufw::install`

Install support class

### <a name="ufwservice"></a>`ufw::service`

Supporting class to set up the ufw service

## Defined types

### <a name="ufwallow"></a>`ufw::allow`

Create allow rule

#### Examples

##### Allow port 22 (sh)

```puppet
ufw::allow { 'allow-ssh-from-all':
  port => '22',
}
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `ufw::allow` defined type:

* [`direction`](#direction)
* [`ensure`](#ensure)
* [`from`](#from)
* [`ip`](#ip)
* [`port`](#port)
* [`proto`](#proto)

##### <a name="direction"></a>`direction`

Data type: `Enum['IN','OUT']`

Traffic direction

Default value: `'IN'`

##### <a name="ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['absent','present']`

Enable of disable rule. default:

Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="from"></a>`from`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['any'],Stdlib::IP::Address]`

Ip address to allow access from.

Default value: `'any'`

##### <a name="ip"></a>`ip`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['any'],Stdlib::IP::Address]`

Ip address to allow access to. default:

Default value: `$facts['networking']['ip']`

##### <a name="port"></a>`port`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['all'],Stdlib::Port]`

Port to act on.

Default value: `'all'`

##### <a name="proto"></a>`proto`

Data type: `Enum[ 'tcp','udp','any']`

Protocol to use.

Default value: `'tcp'`

### <a name="ufwdeny"></a>`ufw::deny`

Define deny rule

#### Examples

##### Deny port 22 (ssh)

```puppet
ufw::deny { 'deny-ssh-from-all':
  port => '22',
}
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `ufw::deny` defined type:

* [`direction`](#direction)
* [`from`](#from)
* [`ip`](#ip)
* [`port`](#port)
* [`proto`](#proto)

##### <a name="direction"></a>`direction`

Data type: `Enum['IN','OUT']`

Traffic directionf or this rule.

Default value: `'IN'`

##### <a name="from"></a>`from`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['any'],Stdlib::IP::Address]`

Ip address to allow access from.

Default value: `'any'`

##### <a name="ip"></a>`ip`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['any'],Stdlib::IP::Address]`

Ip address to allow access to.

Default value: `'any'`

##### <a name="port"></a>`port`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['all'],Stdlib::Port]`

Port to act on.

Default value: `'all'`

##### <a name="proto"></a>`proto`

Data type: `Enum[ 'tcp','udp','any']`

Protocol to use.

Default value: `'tcp'`

### <a name="ufwlimit"></a>`ufw::limit`

Set rate limit for port

#### Examples

##### Rate limit port 22 (ssh)

```puppet
ufw::limit { '22': }
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `ufw::limit` defined type:

* [`proto`](#proto)

##### <a name="proto"></a>`proto`

Data type: `Enum[ 'tcp','udp']`

Protocol to use

Default value: `'tcp'`

### <a name="ufwreject"></a>`ufw::reject`

Define reject rule

#### Examples

##### Reject port 22 (ssh) from all

```puppet
ufw::reject { 'reject-ssh-from-all':
  port => '22',
}
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `ufw::reject` defined type:

* [`direction`](#direction)
* [`from`](#from)
* [`ip`](#ip)
* [`port`](#port)
* [`proto`](#proto)

##### <a name="direction"></a>`direction`

Data type: `Enum['IN','OUT']`

Traffic direction

Default value: `'IN'`

##### <a name="from"></a>`from`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['any'],Stdlib::IP::Address]`

Ip address to allow access from.

Default value: `'any'`

##### <a name="ip"></a>`ip`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['any'],Stdlib::IP::Address]`

Ip address to allow access to.

Default value: `'any'`

##### <a name="port"></a>`port`

Data type: `Variant[Enum['all'],Stdlib::Port]`

Port to act on.

Default value: `'all'`

##### <a name="proto"></a>`proto`

Data type: `Enum[ 'tcp','udp','any']`

Protocol to use.

Default value: `'tcp'`
